name: Organic Wiring
description:
Your ship is damaged, your crew is dying and there are oddly shaped aliens everywhere. There's only one way to fix this: Use your trusty gravity gun to manipulate the aliens and replace the broken wires with them.

WASD or Arrow keys to move.
Left click to pick up an alien. 
Right click to rotate it.

This game was created for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4 with "Connect" as the theme.
